author: Christopher Anderson
text: I'm looking for Fitness for Duty standards for law enforcement, specifically in reference to seizures.  If you have a standard, or a policy regarding the ability of an officer to return to duty after a seizure, could you provide a response?  Thank You!
title: Law Enforcement Fitness for Duty Standards
